column1: The '''''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1979''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin
column2: George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1978]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], with commentary by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. The cover photographer was Billett Potter.<ref>{{webcite
